state.title: State
state.description: an optimization problem can be at one state at any given time (Initial = 1, MatrixProcessing = 2, Optimizing = 3, Optimized = 4, Error = 5, ComputingDirections = 6)

created_timestamp.title: Created Timestamp
created_timestamp.descrption: When the optimization problem was created

scheduled_for.title: Scheduled For
scheduled_for.descrption: An Unix Timestamp the Optimization Problem was scheduled for.

optimization_completed_timestamp.title: Optimization Completed Timestamp
optimization_completed_timestamp.descrption: When the Optimization Problem was completed.

sent_to_background.title: Sent to Background
sent_to_background.descrption: If true it means the solution was not returned (it is being computed in the background)

links.title: Links
links.descrption: Links to the GET operations for the optimization problem

tracking_history.title: TrackingHistory
tracking_history.descrption: A collection of device tracking data with coordinates, speed, and timestamps
